publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-684 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Standards in Scotland's Schools etc. Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee considers the Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1-12, sections 41-51, sections 13-40, sections 52-57 and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-684 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Standards in Scotland's Schools etc. Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Education, Culture and Sport Committee considers the Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1-12, sections 41-51, sections 13-40, sections 52-57 and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
